item.title: Whole road surface is missing, 20th January
item.description:
Various large potholes are now combining and the road structure is disintegrating making the road very bumpy and dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 new very deep pot holes appeared next to one that was repaired, 20th January
item.description:
Towards island driving towards sandy Road about 100 yards up- you can’t miss it because a large pot hole was filled in about a week ago but the smaller ones that were left at that time right next to it have opened up into a really deep hole. This whole road is dangerous for cyclist's and cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stockton Close Strobe Light, 20th January
item.description:
